item.title: Pedophiles could see death penalty under new House GOP bill: 'Taken off the streets permanently'
item.description: Rep. Anna Paulina Luna spoke with Fox News Digital about a slate of legislation she is unveiling in this Congress targeting child sex predators.

item.title: The Congressional Black Caucus Has a Geriatric Problem
